text:
ScaleFactor | Austin, TX | ONSITE | Full-time | Software Developers & Senior Software Developers | https://scalefactor.com/

ScaleFactor is a bookkeeping and finance software company that uses powerful software to create monthly financials, deliver proactive insights, and ensure accounts are accurate and healthy. Our goal: to empower business owners to make the best strategic and financial decisions by automate the painful, time consuming accounting tasks small business owners are forced to complete manually.

Join ScaleFactor, a company that truly values you and your ideas!

- Software Developer: https://scalefactor.com/current-openings/?gh_jid=1442398 - Senior Software Developer: https://scalefactor.com/current-openings/?gh_jid=1442367

Tech stack: Rails, Ember.js, and Postgres
